title: Egg Curry
directions: Place the potatoes, garlic, onion, ginger, diced tomatoes, tomato purée, ground cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and red chile powder in a slow cooker and mix to combine.
Set cooker to low, cover, and allow to cook for 8 hours until potatoes are tender.
Add the granulated sugar and garam masala.
Add the peeled hard boiled eggs to the mixture (make sure they are completely submerged) and allow to cook on low for another hour without the cover to reduce gravy and heat/flavor the eggs.
Serve over a bed of rice.
ingredients: 2 (14.5 oz) Can Diced Tomatoes with juice
